tasks: Publish 5 foundational articles for each of the 5 new niches (25 total)
Create 2 introductory videos for each new niche (10 total)
Set up dedicated social media channels/playlists for new niches
Identify and apply to 5-10 affiliate programs for each new niche
Integrate affiliate links into the first batch of content
Begin outreach for guest posting opportunities
Develop and execute a backlink strategy for the new niche content
Launch targeted social media promotion for the most promising content pieces
Analyze initial traffic and engagement data to identify early winners
